results.title: Synergistic antimyeloma effects of zoledronate and simvastatin.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Zoledronic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077211 @@@Zoledronate@@@ did not show substantial antimyeloma activity at low and intermediate concentrations, whereas @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ potently induced apoptosis in @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Myeloma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009101 @@@myeloma@@@ cells without signs of primary, cell-adhesion-mediated drug resistance.

citations.NLM: Schmidmaier R, Simsek M, Baumann P, Emmerich B, Meinhardt G. Synergistic antimyeloma effects of zoledronate and simvastatin. Anticancer Drugs. 2006 Jul;17(6):621-9. PMID: 16917207
